pageContent: © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Presented by Jean Rissler, EX Product Manager - Reporting  Jenzabar  June 2, 2016  1435 EX & Electronic Transcripts © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  What Does “Electronic Transcript” Mean? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     PDF  •   A copy of your normal paper transcript  •   Generate by printing to a PDF Writer (Adobe Writer or other free options)     EDI  •   A text file in a standard EDI schema ( http://www.pesc.org/interior.php?page_id=146 )  •   EDI schema was defined by the SPEEDE committee of AACRAO and is now maintained by PESC     XML  •   A text file in a standard XML schema ( http://www.pesc.org/interior.php?page_id=86 )  •   Standard is maintained by PESC (P20W Education Standards Council) – P formerly stood for Postsecondary but their mission has broadened  Generally One of Three Options © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Needs to be secure     Needs to be electronic     Often work with another organization to help with the transmission, for example  •   National Student Clearinghouse  •   SPEEDE server  •   Parchment, Credentials, etc.     Often involves help with transcript ordering as well  Getting It From Here to There © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Prior EX Releases     Customizable Transcript to print to paper or PDF     Ability to generate an XML Transcript  EX 5.5.1     Document Master to store copies of transcripts as they are produced  EX 6.0     Ability to generate EDI College Transcripts     Ability to customize the stored procedure to meet specialized requirements  EX 6.1     Ability to import EDI College Transcripts  History of Electronic Transcripts in EX © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Easy to create – Print to the PDF Writer or Save PDF     Looks like your “Regular” transcript     Easy for receiver to read     Getting data into the database involves manual entry or scanning to extract the data you want  PDF Format © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Jenzabar EX has provided the option of generating an XML transcript     Will be updated in the future to incorporate more recent schema updates     Future – capability to import data from a received XML transcript  XML Format © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Future Releases  •   Receive a High School EDI Transcript and pull some data from the file into EX tables     Uses the same data setup as the XML transcript plus new EDI data specific areas     We assume that EDI customers will work with the SPEEDE server to send and receive EDI transcripts  •   Other companies may have this capability  EDI Format © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Data Setup  •   Documentation can be found in the MyJenzabar EX Registration Module Resource Center ( https://www.myjenzabar.net/ICS/Support/EX/Module_Support/Registration.jnz )  •   Also in the same location is a PBL with reports and queries to test the electronic transcript setup data  •   Default r_id_pesc_portrait_transcript available to test single student     Transcript Request  •   Printed/PDF  •   Electronic (EDI or XML)     View Generated Transcripts     Import Transcript  •   Process Internet Submissions  •   Load Courses  Work in EX © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Transcript  Generation © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Work with Transcripts activity center with windows for setup     Fill in the PESC columns  Data Setup © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc. June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Buttons available depend on what needs to be created  Move to Transcript Window © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Click the Create Electronic Transcript button     If have Document Storage checked get prompt     Prompts for path to store the transcript and if want to view the first one generated  Transcript Window © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc. June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Process Possible Transfer Courses     Add ID as an Advisee (does not need to be a Student)     Right-click on Advisee and choose the Prospective Student Transfer Course Entry option  •   View loaded courses  •   Fill in ARC and Transcript Division  •   Select row(s) - Populate Target Year/Term and Grade Values  •   Change Transfer Status to Approved for Transfer  •   Select row(s) – Click Transfer Selected Rows to Student Course History (must be student first) © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc. June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Change Transfer Status to Approved for Transfer     Select row(s) – Click Transfer Selected Rows to Student Course History (must be student first)  Prospective Student Transfer Course Entry © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Ability to  •   Read in an XML transcript and load data into tables  •   Data from a scanned transcript to XML and then load the data into tables     Ability to  •   Receive standardized transcript request files (XML, EDI, other?)  •   Load that data into the TRANSCRIPT_REQUEST table  •   Generate the transcript status response file to send back     Automated transcript ordering, hold checking and delivery  •   Once you get transcripts generating, could work with Services to set up specific processes if required by your state or other body  Future Possibilities © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Questions?  Suggestions?
